channel.title: Auto Ess or Coal, 70 Mining. p2p
channel.description: Lvl 3 account. 70 mining. Should I auto ess or coal? The account is sort of a skiller name, and most of the time I will be sitting next to the computer monitoring it, incase people talk and what not.

item.title: Auto Ess or Coal, 70 Mining. p2p
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I want to say coal. On the other hand the last time I played I sold for 250ea.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Ess or Coal, 70 Mining. p2p
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:7, topic:120359”][quote author=Tr3v0r link=topic=169859.msg1574564#msg1574564 date=1183770724]
Coal, way faster and close to bank.
[/quote]

Not if your in yannile, using mage guild to get to the ess mines, you can click quick bank soon as your out of the doors of the mage bank.[/quote]

Edit: Meant to type ess lol.

item.title: Auto Ess or Coal, 70 Mining. p2p
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

hmm. Coal is 180 ea. Pure Ess is 90-100 ea. By myself I can get 27 coal in 5-6 mins or less at the guild. I could probaly get 2-3x that ammount of ess in that time, becasue scripts aren’t the fastest…I don’t no, more people reply!

Read full topic
